name: libupnp-pupnp-1.6.6
location: lib/libupnp.so.3.0.5: HIDDEN 'Portable SDK for UPnP devices/1.6.6'
description: Portable SDK for UPnP (pupnp) version 1.6.6. Version information confirmed through string analysis. No publicly available CVE records found in NVD. It is recommended to check upstream security advisories and vulnerability tracking systems.
notes: It is recommended to check the security advisories of the pupnp project and analyze the security of the UPnP protocol implementation.

name: ntfs-3g-83.0.0
description: NTFS-3G component, version number 83.0.0 was inferred from the filename, with no explicit version identifier found in the file content. Multiple potentially relevant CVEs were identified, but it could not be confirmed whether version 83.0.0 is affected.
notes: It is recommended to contact the supplier to confirm the exact version and, if possible, upgrade to the latest version (>=2021.8.22).

name: vsftpd-2.3.2
description: vsftpd version 2.3.2 has been confirmed to exist in multiple locations within the program, including error messages and welcome banners. There are currently no known CVE records for this version in the NVD database.
notes: It is recommended to check other vulnerability databases such as Exploit-DB or vendor security bulletins to confirm the vulnerability status.

name: dropbear-ssh-2012.55
description: Dropbear SSH version 2012.55 has been confirmed to contain multiple high-risk vulnerabilities (CVE-2016-7406, CVE-2016-7407, etc.), which affect versions prior to 2016.74.
notes: It is recommended to upgrade to a version later than 2016.74, or implement network-level protection and restrict SSH access.

name: samba-unknown
description: Samba component, the version cannot be precisely determined, but based on compiler information (GCC 3.3.2), it is likely to be older. Further CVE searches are required for Samba versions compiled with GCC 3.3.2.
notes: The binary has been stripped, making version identification more difficult and requiring more advanced analysis tools.

name: pppd-2.4.3
description: pppd version 2.4.3 has been confirmed to exist in multiple version strings. No known CVE records were found for this exact version, but it contains authentication processing code and network protocol negotiation functionality, posing potential risks.
notes: Verify whether it is the latest patched version and monitor for authentication-related vulnerabilities.

name: wpa_supplicant-2.0-devel
notes: The version string indicates this is a development build, which may contain additional unmatched vulnerabilities.

name: ushare-1.1a
description: uShare version 1.1a has been confirmed to exist in multiple locations within the binary output. While there are no direct CVE records for this specific version in the NVD database, dependent libraries (libupnp, libixml, etc.) require separate analysis.
notes: Check the CVEs of dependent libraries and verify known vulnerabilities in vendor announcements
